game.name: Berserk B.I.T.S
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Berserk B.I.T.S is an idle-rpg, auto-battler, chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop. Let your B.I.T do battle and collect items. Collect rare chips and build your deck! Customize and Level up to take down intense Virus bosses as you unravel the mysteries behind the attacks on the Net.
